channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Retired UFC Hall Of Famer Nears Return, But Dana White Hates The Idea
item.description: Donald "Cowboy" Cerrone is serious about his comeback to the UFC. He's moving forward, but Dana White has already said he hates the idea.

item.title: Microsoft Warns Millions Of Windows Users—Do Not Install This Update On Your PC
item.description: How not to update your PC—according to Microsoft.

item.description: Should Wanderlei Silva be allowed to compete in the new Global Fight League? A fan recently asked the question and the GFL's X account answered.
